display_long_description:
Welcome to PadelVR Training!

Included in Early Access
- Two lessons with renowned coach Pablo Crosetti
- Preloaded drills
- Configurable ball thrower for custom shot scenarios
- Mental training exercises
- Session statistics
- Access to the PadelVR game

PadelVR is a realistic padel simulator—no AI assistance adjusts your performance. Your results reflect your movements and technique, providing an authentic training experience. To maximize results, we’ve developed a padel racket adapter that replicates the weight, balance, and air friction of a real racket. Using it is key to building muscle memory that seamlessly translates to the court.

While our physics system is still evolving, it already receives positive feedback from professionals, and we’re constantly improving it to enhance realism.

Future Features (Roadmap):
We’re just getting started! Expect monthly updates with:

- A complete suite of lessons with Pablo Crosetti
- Specialized drills to perfect techniques
- Tactical exercises for better decision-making
- Online training sessions with real coaches

Important Notes:
- Domestic Version Only: Limited to 3 hours daily and one user profile.
- Professional Version Coming Soon: Unlimited training, multi-profile support, and advanced features.

Join us as we refine PadelVR Training! Your feedback is vital to building the future of padel training. Train anytime, anywhere, in any weather—through virtual reality!
